key_risks: Supply chain vulnerabilities due to global disruptions
Economic sensitivity to industrial and commercial activity fluctuations
Regulatory compliance challenges with evolving environmental and safety standards
controversies: Ongoing litigation in *Oxygenator Water Techs. v. Tennant Co.* regarding royalty calculations and patent validity
Labor lawsuit alleging wage violations and failure to provide meal and rest breaks under California labor laws
environmental_issues: Need to comply with stringent sustainability standards in various regions
social_issues: Labor disputes and potential harm to employee relations
Ongoing investment required for employee well-being and diversity initiatives
governance_issues: Legal disputes and potential financial liabilities impacting corporate governance
